_meanings:
{@--1@} (Used as a prefix
to verbs and regarded as a 
preposition or {#gati#}) ({%a%}) In the middle,
between; in, into, inside; {#°han, °DA#},
{#°gam, °BU, °i, °lI#} &c. ({%b%}) Under

{@--4@} It is 
frequently used as the first member of
compounds in the sense of 
‘internally,’ ‘inside,’ ‘within,’ ‘in the 
interior,’ ‘having in the interior,’ ‘filled
with,’ ‘having concealed within,’ or
in the sense of ‘inward,’ ‘internal,’
‘secret,’ ‘hidden’ &c., forming 
Adverbial, Bahuvrīhi or Tatpuruṣa
compounds; {#kuMdamaMtastuzAraM#} (<ab>Bah.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab>)
<ls>Ś. 5. 19</ls> filled with dew; {#°toyaM#} (<ab>Bah.</ab>
<ab>comp.</ab>) <ls>Me. 64</ls>; {#aMtargiri#} (Adv. <ab>comp.</ab>)
<ls>Ki. 1. 34</ls>; {#jvalayati tanUmaMtardAhaH#} (<ab>Tat.</ab>
<ab>comp.</ab>) <ls>U. 3. 31</ls>; so {#°kopaH, °koRaH#},
{#°AkUtaM#} &c.

{@--5@} It is also supposed
to be a particle of assent ({#svIkArArTaka#}).
({%Note%}. In <ab>comp.</ab> the {#r#} of {#aMtar#} is
changed to a visarga before hard
consonants, as {#aMtaHkaraRaM, aMtaHsTa#} &c.).
[<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%inter%}; Zend {%antare%}; <ab>Goth.</ab>
{%undar%}; Pers. {%andar%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%entos%};].

the breast (= {#aMtarA-aMsa#}
<ab>q. v.</ab>).

{1} inward,
internal, comprehended, included
(with <ab>abl.</ab>); {#trayamaMtaraMgaM pUrveByaH#} 

<ls>Pat. Sūtra</ls>.

{2} proximate, related to, 
essential to or referring to the 
essential part of the {#aMga#} or base of a word
(<ab>opp.</ab> {#bahiraMga#}); {#DAtUpasargayoH kAryamaMtaraMgaM#}
<ls>P. VIII. 3. 74</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>

<ls n="Dk.">21</ls>;
the interior.

{3} an essential or indispensable part,
as {#SravaRa, manana & nidiDyAsana#} in realizing
Brahma.

an inner part; 
<ls>P. V. 4. 62.</ls>

the ether or
Brahma that resides in the heart of
man (a term often occurring in the
Upaniṣads).

secret or 
hidden intention.

an 
additional augment between two letters.

the interior of a house;  
<ls>Y. 2. 31.</ls>

a market in the heart
(inside) of a town.

;
See <ab>s. v.</ab>

rejoicing in
oneself, finding pleasure in his soul
or heart;  
{#yoMtaHsuKoMtarArAmastaTAMtarjyotirevasaH#} <ls>Bg. 5. 24.</ls>

an internal
organ or sense.

<ab>Ved.</ab> a secret
abode.

a certain number of years (with 

Buddhists).

inwardly
crooked (<ab>fig.</ab> also); fraudulent.
a conch-shell.
a disease of worms in the body.
= {#aMqakowarapuzpI#}.

{1}
internal disturbance; <ls>H. 3.</ls>

{2} 
inward wrath, secret anger.
the interior of a store-room.

the secret or hidden Ganges 
(supposed to communicate underground
with a secret stream in Mysore).

useless,
unprofitable, unnecessary, 
unavailing; {#kimanenAMtargaqunA#} <ls>Sarva. S.</ls> ( 
{#grIvApradeSajAtasya galamAMsapiMqasya gaqoryaTA nirarTakatvaM#}
{#tadvat#}).

&c. See under  
{#aMtargam#}.

{1} bearing young, 
pregnant.

{2} having a {#garBa#} or inside; so
{#°garBin#}.
in mountains.
the sphincter muscle.

with poison concealed in
the heart.

{1} the inner apartment of a
house, the interior of a house.

<ab>N.</ab> of a country of
Bāhīka (or Bālhīka) ( 
<ls>P. III. 3. 78</ls> {#bAhIkagrAmaviSezasya saMjYeyaM#} <ls>Sk.</ls>).
striking in the middle <ls>P. III. 3. 78.</ls>

born or bred
in the interior (as a worm &c.).
the stomach.

in the
stomach.

the inner part of
the jaws ({#KAdanasTAnaM jaMBaH#}, 
{#daMtapaMktyoraMtarAlaM#}).
inborn, innate.
between the knees.
inward or secret knowledge.

enlightened inwardly, with an
enlightened soul.

the 
inward light, light of Brahma.
inflammation.

inward heat
or fire; mental anxiety.
burning in wardly.

internal fever
or heat <ls>Ś. 3. 13.</ls>

distillation of
spirituous liquor, or a substance used
to produce fermentation.

a 

term in astronomy, the time when
a particular planet exercises its 
influence over man's destiny ({#jyotizoktaH#}
{#mahAdaSAMtargato grahARAM svADipatyakAlaBedaH#}).

an interval of 10 days; {# °hAt#}
before 10 days <ls>Ms. 8. 222</ls>; {# °he#} <ls n="Ms.">5. 79.</ls>
{2} inflammation.
sad or afflicted at heart.

internally bad, wicked or base at
heart.

examining one's
own soul, insight into oneself.

an intermediate region of the 
compass.

a private or secret door
within the house ({#prakozWadvAraM#}).
&c. see <ab>s. v.</ab>

the 
palace of a king (being inside the
town); <ab>cf.</ab> {#°puraM#}; {#daSAnanAMtarnagaraM dadarSa#}
<ls>Rām.</ls>

engaged in
internal meditation.

a screen
of cloth held between two persons
who are to be united (as a bride and
bridegroom, or pupil and preceptor)
until the actual time of union 
arrives.
<ab>Ved.</ab> being on the way.

in the interior of an 
inflected word.

= {#suzumRAmaDyagataH#} 
{#paMTAH#}.
the innermost garment.

being between the ribs
(as flesh).

the Soma when
in the straining vessel.

{1} insertion of a letter
(in <ab>gram.</ab>)

{2} a post fixed in the
middle of the sacrificial ground
(used in ritual works); {#aMtaHpUrveRa#}
{#yUpaM parItyAMtaHpAtyadeSe sTApayati#} <ls>Kāty.</ls>
{1} inserted.
<ab>Ved.</ab> interior of a vessel.

one who watches over the
inner apartments of a palace.

women of the palace, inmates
of the female apartments;

guardian or 
superintendent of the harem, chamberlain;
{#vfdDaH kulodgataH SaktaH pitfpEtAmahaH SuciH .#} 
{#rAjYAmaMtaHpurADyakzo vinItaSca taTezyate ..#} (of these
five sorts are mentioned:-- {#vAmanaka#},
{#jaGanya, kubja, maMqalaka#} and {#sAmin#} see Bṛ.
S.)

one belonging to the
harem.
a chamberlain = {#°cara#}.

the menstrual matter
of women, before it regularly begins
to flow every month;  
{#varzadvAdaSakAdUrDvaM yadi puzpaM bahirnahi . aMtaHpuzpaM Bavatyeva#}
{#panasoquMbarAdivat#} <ls>Kāśyapa</ls>; {# °zpaM#} is 
therefore the age between 12 and the
menstruation period.
ulcerous.
<ab>Ved.</ab> drinking up.

{1} the internal nature or 
constitution of man.

{2} the ministry or
body of ministers of a king.

{3}
heart or soul.

knowing 
oneself, with an enlightened soul.
residence in the interior.

suppressed tears, inward tears;  
{#nigfhya °zpaM#} <ls>Bh. 3. 6</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5.</ls>
see under {#aMtarBU#} separately.

split or broken inside, perforated,
bored (said of a pearl) <ls>Pt. 4</ls> (also
torn by dissensions).
interior of the earth.
subterranean, underground.

having the rutting state concealed 
within; <ls>R. 2. 7.</ls>

{1} sad, 
disconsolate, dejected, distracted.

{2} one
who has concentrated and turned his
mind inward, lost in abstract 
meditation.

{1} going 
into the mouth, pointing or turned
inward; <ls>Mv. 5. 26.</ls>

{2} having an 
inward entrance or opening ( 
{#bAhyavastuparihAreRa paramAtmavizayakatayA praveSayuktaM#} 
{#cittAdi#}).

{3} an epithet of the soul called
{#prAjYa#}, when it is enjoying the sweet
bliss of sleep ({#AnaMdaBuk cetomuKaH prAjYaH#}
{#iti SruteH#}).

a sort of surgical
scissors (having an opening inside),
one of the 20 instruments 
mentioned by Suśruta in chapter 8 of 
Sūtrasthāna.

a name given
in the Tantras for the letters of
the alphabet assigned to the six 
lotuses ({#padma#}) of the body;

a
term used in Tantra literature for
the mental assignment of the several
letters of the alphabet to the 
different parts of the body

sealed inside; <ab>N.</ab> of a form of 
devotion.
still-born.

mental sacrifice or worship, a mode of
worship referred to in the Tantras.

{1} suppression of the breath
and voice.

{2} {#°pAtraM#}, a sacrificial vessel
({#graharUpaM sAmAparAKyaM yajYiyapAtraM#}); 
according to others, a Soma libation made
during the suppression of breath and
voice; {#suhavA sUryAyAMtaryAmamanumatraMyet#} Ait.
Br.

{1} regulating the soul
or internal feelings, soul; 
Providence, Supreme Spirit as guiding
and regulating mankind, Brahma;
according to the <ls>Bṛ. Ār. Up.</ls>  
{#aMtaryAmin#} ‘the internal check’ is the
Supreme Being and not the 
individual soul; ‘who standing in the
earth is other than the earth, whom
the earth knows not, whose body
the earth is, who internally 
restrains and governs the earth; the
same is {%thy%} soul (and mine), the
internal check {#aMtaryAmin#}, &c. &c.;  
{#aMtarAviSya BUtAni yo biBartyAtmaketuBiH .#} 
{#aMtaryAmISvaraH sAkzAdBavet#} &c.
{2} wind;

<ab>N.</ab> of a Brāhmaṇa included in the
<ls>Bṛ. Ār. Up.</ls>

deep meditation,
abstraction.
acute-angular.

an acute-angled triangle (<ab>opp.</ab>
{#bahirlaMba#}) (the perpendicular from
the vertex or {#laMba#} falling within
{#aMtar#} the triangle).

{2} 
inherent.

(<ls>P. V. 4. 117</ls>)
covered with hair on the inside.

[{#aMtargatamAcCAdyaM loma ac#}] the hair to
be covered.
= {#°puraM#} <ab>q. v.</ab>

a superintendent of the women's
apartments; <ls>Pt. 3</ls>, <ls>K. 93.</ls>

situated in a forest; {#°Ro deSaH#}
<ls>P. VI. 2. 179</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>

{%<ab>ind.</ab>%} within
a forest <ls>P. VIII. 4. 5.</ls>

being
in the interior; having something
in the interior.

<ab>Ved.</ab>
[{#aMtarastyasyAM garBaH#}] a pregnant 
woman; {#aMtarvatnI prajAvatI#} <ls>R. 15. 13.</ls>

indigestion, flatulence; 
belching.

being or 
dwelling inside, included or comprised
in.

<ab>N.</ab> of a Soma sacrifice (for
{#rAjyakAma#} and {#paSukAma#}).
an under-garment <ls>Ks. 4. 52.</ls>

_gram:
[{#aMtaH aMtaraMgaBAvaM aMtaHkaraRaM vA vAti#} 
{#gacCati snigDatvena, vA-vic#} <ls>Tv.</ls>]
_meanings:
forming part
of oneself such as children, cattle &c.
inwardly.

{%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({#astyarTe matup masya vaH#}) having
progeny, cattle &c; {#aMtarvAvatkzayaM daDe#}
<ls>Rv. 1. 40. 7</ls>; abounding with 
precious things inside.

skilled or versed in 
scriptures, very learned ({#SAstrAvid#}).

entering within, 
penetration.

<ab>Ved.</ab> ({#viduzI#} {%<ab>f.</ab>%}) 
knowing correctly or exactly (knowing
the paths between heaven and
earth) <ls>Rv. 1. 72. 7.</ls>

inward
uneasiness or anxiety, inward fever.

pertaining to the inside of
the sacrificial ground.
within this ground.

[{#aMtargatA#}
{#vediryatra deSe#}] the tract of land 
between the rivers Gaṅgā and 
Yamunā, regarded as a sacred region and
the principal seat of Āryan 
Brāhmaṇas; <ab>cf.</ab> {#ete BagavatyO BUmidevAnAM#} 
{#mUlamAyatanamaMtarvedipUrveRa kaliMdakanyAmaMdAkinyO#} 
{#saMgacCete#} <ls>A. R. 7</ls>; it is supposed to
have extended from Prayāga to
Haridvāra and is also known by the
names of {#SaSasTalI#} and {#brahmAvarta#}.
inhabitants of this land.

the inner apartments, interior of a 

house.
a chamberlain.
internal arrow or disease.

internal and spiritual part of man; the
interior of the body.

having in the interior an arrow, pin or
any such extraneous matter; rankling
inside.

<ab>N.</ab> of a river rising
from the Vindhya mountain.

<ab>Ved.</ab> internal support 
(scaffolding &c.) {#etAni ha vE#} 
{#vedAnAmaMtaHSlezaRAni yadetA vyAhftayaH#} <ls>Ait. Br.</ls>

inwardly conscious (said of trees &c.);
{#°jYA BavaMtyete suKaduHKasamanvitAH#} <ls>Ms. 1. 49.</ls>

having inward strength
&c.
{1} a pregnant woman.

{2} the
marking nut.

internal pain,
sorrow, regret.

upright at
heart, or having Sarala trees 
inside; <ls>K. 51.</ls>

internal treasure or store, inner store
or contents; {#vamaMtyuccEraMtaHsAraM#} <ls>H. 2. 105</ls>
internal matter or essence (and pus).

whose delight is in self,
inwardly happy <ls>Bg. 5. 24</ls>
into the midst of armies.

(also written {#aMtasTa#}) being 
between or in the midst.

a term applied to the semivowels,
{#y, r, l, v#} as standing between
vowels and consonants and being
formed by a slight contact of the
vocal organs ({#IzatspfzwaM aMtasTAnAM#}); or
they are so called because they
stand between {#sparSa (ka-ma)#} letters and
{#uzman (Sa, za, sa, ha)#}.

{1} a deity
of the vital organs.

{2} <ab>N.</ab> of one of
the Ṛgveda hymns.

the 
malleus of the ear.
an elephant (in rut).
striking in the middle.

<ab>N.</ab> of a country {#bAhIka#}  
<ls>P. VIII. 4. 24</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>

in the hand,
within reach of the hand.

being in the hand or within
reach of the hand.

laughing
inwardly (in the sleeves), a secret
or suppressed laugh; {#sAMtarhAsaM kaTitaM#}
<ls>Me. 111</ls> with a suppressed laugh,
with a gentle smile.

the 
interior of the heart.
